main.title: the monument
main.body:
a colossal structure reaches for the sky, its surface a translucent and deep purple. it is cool to the touch, and at eye level, an engraving has been etched roughly into the hard rock.A SEPULCHER EAST, AT OCEAN'S EDGE.
FROM ABOVE, WREST THOSE BELOW
TO EMBARK ON ENDLESS JOURNEY.

MUNDUS
